sentences.sContent: What these pictures demonstrate is that we do feel the pain of others, however distantly.
sentences.sContent_eng: What these pictures demonstrate is that we do feel the pain of others, however distantly.
sentences.sCn: 这些照片证实了 无论距离的远近 我们都可以感受到他人的痛楚。

sentences.sContent: Previous research which has looked at why certain groups of living mammals have bigger brains has relied on studies of distantly-related living mammals.
sentences.sContent_eng: Previous research which has looked at why certain groups of living mammals have bigger brains has relied on studies of distantly-related living mammals.
sentences.sCn: 科学家先前在探寻为何特定的现存哺乳动物族群会拥有相对大的脑时，多借助于研究关系较为疏远的现存哺乳动物。

sentences.sContent: They are very distantly followed by India, Brazil and Russia.
sentences.sContent_eng: They are very distantly followed by India, Brazil and Russia.
sentences.sCn: 远远跟在后面的，是印度、巴西和俄罗斯。
